full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcment

### Project Title

* English: Tentage and parts
* French: Tentage et pièces

### Reference Information

* Reference Number: `PW-22-01007870`
* Amendment Number: `4`
* Solicitation Number: `W8486-228293/B`
* Publication Date: `2022-09-22`
* Tender Closing Date: `2022-11-25T14:00:00`
* Amendment Date: `2022-11-23`

### Procurement Category

* Category: `GD` (General Department)
* Procurement Method: `Competitive - Open bidding`

### Goods and Services Requirement

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at:

* Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal
* Department of National Defence, 7 CF Supply Depot, Edmonton, Alberta

The following items are required:

| Item | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | TENT, GSIN 8340, NCAGE 1MGR2 | 100 EA | EA to be delivered to CFSD Montreal |
| 2 | TENT, GSIN 8340, NCAGE 1MGR2 | 100 EA | EA to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton |
|  ... ( list continues ) |

### Submission Requirements

Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Additional Information

Please refer to the attached documents for more information.

[Attachments]

Note:

* GSIN stands for Government Services and Information Management.
* NCAGE stands for North American Aerospace Defense Command Aerospace Standard Catalogue.
* NIBS stands for National Item Blanket Purchase Agreement.
* EA stands for Each Article.
* CFSD stands for Canadian Forces Supply Depot.
* DAFC stands for Defence Acquisition Review.

Attachments can be found at the following URL: [insert URL] 

End of announcement. 
No responses were received. The tender is expired.
,
And here are the linked attachments:
* Amendment 1: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/27/3ea7c3af1c2dc2965079b413
